markdownRemark.html:
//无穷序列的可迭代对象
let index = 0 
let sequence = {
  [Symbol.iterator] ()  {
    return {
      next(){
        return {value: index++}
      }
    }
  }
}
//中间层take包装
function take(sequence, aount) {
  return {
    [Symbol.iterator]() {
      let iter = sequence[Symbol.iterator]()
      return {
        next() {
          if (aount-- < 1) {
            return {
              done: true
            }
          } else {
            return iter.next()
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

console.log([...take(sequence, 10)])

frontmatter.title: 从迭代器的无穷序列里取值
